## Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency, is issuing a request for proposal for the acquisition of services in Research and Development for the Intelliport initiative. The successful bidder will provide monitoring services for environmental variables in the St. Lawrence River using Earth observation technologies in the context of the Contrecoeur Port terminal expansion.

### Expected Contract Terms
* Expected contract start date: None
* Expected contract end date: August 31, 2026

### Tender Requirements
All bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on April 18, 2023. Any bids submitted after this date will be deemed non-responsive.
